001.comments: If registation is blocked, the seminar is full and you should register on waitlist ARTH 464 01W.The Epinal ProjectThis seminar will use the work of Arakawa Shusaku (1936-2010) and Madeline Gins (1941-2014) as a point of departure for an investigation of the body in postwar and contemporary art, in Japan and abroad. Topics discussed will include avant-gardist legacies in contemporary art (in particular, ideas about the body in surrealism and dada); changing notions of objecthood in postwar art; the investigation of perception and meaning, and the body at its limits.

01W.comments: ARTH 464 01W is a waitlist for ARTH 464 001. Students will be moved from the waitlist into the seminar as seats become available, and then notified of their registration via email.
